```{r}
url <- paste0("http://www.baseball-reference.com/teams/CHC/2016-payroll-salaries.shtml")

chc_payroll <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  .[[length(.)]] %>%
  html_table(header=TRUE) %>%
  
```

```{r}

option_salaries <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@class="tooltip x_small_text"]') %>%
  html_attr("tip")
```
